string.text: Stop EyeLeo activity and close the application
Disable EyeLeo activity: don't show notifications and breaks
Take a long a break now
EyeLeo is now counting time for short and long breaks. Next long break will be in %s.
EyeLeo is now working. Pause ended.
EyeLeo reminds you about a long break coming in %s.
EyeLeo accounted your absence as a long break. Next one will be in %s.
A long break is time when you have to get rest from your computer. During that time display is dimmed.
Notify me about a long break coming in
Preliminary notification will help you gradually prepare for a long Break.
Short breaks happen more often than long breaks, but they are shorter. During that time you need to perform a short eye exercise.
Show mini pauses in fullscreen mode
When fullscreen mode is enabled mini pauses will be displayed like big pauses - with semitransparent background. Otherwise it will be displayed as little window in center of the screen.
The Strict mode is designed for those who find it really hard to tear away from the computer. In this mode you can't ignore or postpone the Long Break
If this option is disabled, then the exercise 'look at the window' won't be shown.
Let me close notifications with the right mouse button
Enable this option if you want to have a possibility to close notification windows with the right mouse button
Tracks mouse/keyboard inactivity and automatically considers a rest taken
If this option is disabled, you won't get any status notifications (End of pause, first launch, etc.)
It helps you to care about your health when you are sitting in front of a computer.{n}It reminds you to have regular breaks so that you could take a rest for your eyes, move your body and relax.

If you have any suggestions, click on the 'Give feedback' button to proceed to EyeLeo feedback page. Please also consider making a donation because the project is free for everybody, but not free for its author. Thank you!
Take a short break.{n}Roll your eyes.
Time for a short break.{n}Roll your eyes.
Time for a break.{n}Roll your eyes.
Take a short break!{n}Move your eyes up and down.
Take a break!{n}Move your eyes up and down.
Time for a short break!{n}Move your eyes up and down.
Time for a break!{n}Move your eyes up and down.
Short break!{n}Move your eyes up and down.
Take a short break!{n}Move your eyes left and right.
Take a break!{n}Move your eyes left and right.
Time for a short break!{n}Move your eyes left and right.
Time for a break!{n}Move your eyes left and right.
Short break!{n}Move your eyes left and right.
Take a short break!{n}Close your eyes for a few seconds.
Take a break!{n}Close your eyes for a few seconds.
Time for a short break!{n}Close your eyes for a few seconds.
Time for a break!{n}Close your eyes for a few seconds.
Short break!{n}Close your eyes for a few seconds.
Take a short break!{n}Blink your eyes.
Time for a short break!{n}Blink your eyes.
Time for a break!{n}Blink your eyes.
Take a short break!{n}Look at distant objects through the window.
Take a break!{n}Look at distant objects through the window.
Time for a short break!{n}Look at distant objects through the window.
Time for a break!{n}Look at distant objects through the window.
Short break!{n}Look at distant objects through the window.
Take a short break{n}and stretch your body.
Take a break{n}and stretch your body.
Time for a short break!{n}Stretch your body.
Time for a break!{n}Stretch your body.
Did you know that you could change EyeLeo preferences?
If you like EyeLeo, consider making a donation on eyeleo.com
If you like EyeLeo, tell your friend about it.
Check out a new version of EyeLeo at eyeleo.com
It's time for a long break!{n}Are you ready?
Please, minimize or close the fullscreen application to start a break
It's time for a long break.{n}Stand up and move your body.
It's time for a long break.{n}Spend a few minutes taking rest from the display.
It's time for a long break.{n}Move your body and relax your eyes.
